commit message:
Remove the zoom menu item

It doesn't do anything.

Add an intent to open conjugation URLs from Catalan Dictionary

There's a dictionary application called Catalan Dictionary that has
links for the articles in verbs to its website to show the
conjugation. This adds an intent to intercept the URLs and show them
in Catverbs instead. The verb is shown in the SearchActivity by
filling in the search box.

SearchActivity: Set the search string only once after onCreate

Like the ArticleActivity, it now handles the intent only once in
onStart the first time it is started after onCreate. Otherwise it
resets the search string everytime you return to the application.

Move the Catalan Dictionary intent to the StartActivity

That way when choosing the application to use for the URL the name
‘Catverbs’ will appear instead of ‘Buscar’. It will also make it
possible to jump directly to the article instead of the search view.
MenuHelper: Add a helper method to display an article

Move the search string normalisation in to Trie

That way it can be used by the StartActivity to search based on an
intent.

StartActivity: Jump directly to the article if an exact match is found

When an intent is used from Catalan Dictionary it will now try to find
an exact match by searching in the Trie. If one is found it will
directly display the article instead of showing the search page.
